page.title: 08Education in Pencombe area
page.content: There are no educational facilities in the map reference area. However pre- school children can attend Pencombe Playgroup which is run with voluntary help in Pencombe Parish Hall. Most children from the age of five attend Pencombe CE Primary School. At the age of eleven the majority transfer to the Queen Elizabeth High School, Bromyard. A few children travel to secondary schools in Leominster and Hereford. Those wishing to continue their education after sixteen years of age have to travel to further education colleges in Hereford. These include the Sixth Form College, Catering College, Technical and Art College, College of Agriculture and the School of Farriers. There are also day and evening classes for people no longer in full-time education but who wish to study various subjects.
